imdb.plot outline: They're some of Libya's best and brightest - we follow 23 graduates from Benghazi as they embark on a year long management science course at Cambridge University in the UK. The idea is to bring back skills to help build Libya's scientific research base, but as the country descends further into civil war, what sort of situation will they return to?
imdb.title: Young, Clever & Libyan
plot: They're some of Libya's best and brightest - we follow 23 graduates from Benghazi as they embark on a year long management science course at Cambridge University in the UK. The idea is to bring back skills to help build Libya's scientific research base, but as the country descends further into civil war, what sort of situation will they return to?::BBC
